content: Hi folks, I am trying to build a version of wasmtime that can run inside an SGX enclave. Wanted to understand what it takes and how I could go about it? since Wasmtime is written in rust. I found project Wamr which has a sgx option, but the project we are working on is heavily dependent on wasmtime and making wasmtime working inside an enclave would be amazing for us.

Personally I don't know much about SGX myself so I don't know a good answer to this. I don't think many of the other maintainers are really all that familiar with SGX either. There's an SGX target for Rust although I'm not sure how well maintained that is.
you might look at the enarx project
